name: Sprint1Week3Project
description: This week's scripting and the videos were very intense. I had difficulties writing the C# code and following the video at the same time. The camera position on the canvas was a bit hard for me to position the object to display on the gaming canvas. Also, it took a long time for me to understand the scaling of the click detector so I can position the button and the sliders. Apart from these issues, I was able to work smoothly and completed the game. I added a picture and colors to the canvas so that my game will look a bit unique. I changed the RGB colors for the game in C#. After the scene builds and publish, I had issues with the ratio of the canvas. The aliment of slider and button was all over the place on the web. So, I had to go back and recreate the ratio and rebuild the scene and publish it on the web.
